title: What Are The Odds of Losing 11 Games of Ranked in a Row?
body: As of late I've been getting into ranked again as the new queue came out and I was hoping to get a higher placement than silver. As I was playing my placement matches I won 2 and I was feeling good about ranked. Then I lost and lost and lost and went 2-8 in my placements. The three games after I have also lost. Why does every match feel like everyone on my team is terrible? We all get stomped in our respective roles and all the games are very heavily favored to the enemy team. It doesn't seem like something that should be happening, but is nonetheless. It is rather frustrating because as soon as i go back to normal queue I seem to do fine, the teams are well balanced and the games aren't as one sided. Has anyone else had this happen?

replies.body:
Last season, I got into Plat. Once I hit Plat, I think my record was like 3-27. Couldn't buy a win. At one point I think me and my duo partner had an 0-17 record. We lost so much my Duo friend actually stopped playing for the rest of the season.

These kinds of things happen. Just have to play through them and hope you don't ruin your MMR in the mean time.
I know for me, the fact that my record was like 0-10 or so got to me and once we got a little behind I thought "oh great, another loss" and probably played worse because of it.

What helped was, taking a break for 10 mins after the game and actually breaking down what happened. What happened in lane, should I have played more aggressive, why did we lose this fight, why didnt we get drag here etc etc.
Sometimes the simple answer is: "the enemy was better" and you move on.

"The enemy was better"

That's the hardest thing to say.

Seriously. Sometimes I know a game will swing towards one result because the enemy are simply better than us. We haven't even got a bad score or have fed, but the enemy are just outplaying us individually, and moving as a team. Yet everyone screams "OMG NEGATIVE ATTITUDE REPORT REPORT"

That's cause Riot has it drilled into the stupid part of the player base that if you aren't suck the dicks of the 9 other people, you're toxic.


Another one that triggers people is "Our comp sucks"

When I first started ranked I wasn't ready for it and went 0-22. it was a demoralising time. I had to go and look at everything I did and change position and deepen my champion pool. And I'm still terrible but I pretty much win for lose most of the time
